parts.text: Develop an institutional trading platform with real-time market data feeds, advanced order management systems, comprehensive portfolio tracking, risk controls, regulatory compliance for equities and derivatives, and real-time P&L calculations

Thank you for the request. To get started, we need to set up the repository first. We follow a GitOps practice, which means the repo isn't just for codeâ€”it's the anchor for your entire project. Setting it up now ensures that every design choice and configuration we make next has a permanent home immediately.

I've popped up the options below for you to choose the language and repository strategy. Since we're building an institutional trading platform with real-time data, advanced order management, portfolio tracking, risk controls, regulatory compliance for equities and derivatives, and real-time P&L calculations, selecting the right language and repo strategy will determine the template and branch workflow I initialize.

Please select one of the options shown.
